Call_Flow_Engine

HOW IT HANDLES CALLS

Every Roofing call follows a structured intake, routing, and booking process tailored to your workflow.

Intake_Questions
  • Is this for storm damage or a routine roof issue?
  • What type of damage are you seeing? (missing shingles, leaks, hail damage, fallen tree)
  • What is the property address?
  • Do you have a homeowners insurance policy?
  • Would you like to schedule a free inspection?
Routing_Rules
  • If active leak into home, priority dispatch for tarp service
  • If commercial property, route to commercial division
  • If asking about financing, collect info for finance team follow-up
After_Call_Actions
  • Send inspection confirmation with what to expect and insurance tips
  • Add to CRM with damage type, insurance status, and address
  • Trigger pre-inspection email with documentation checklist

Common_Questions

OBJECTIONS, HANDLED.

How do you handle the storm call surge?
AI scales instantly. Whether 10 calls or 200, every homeowner gets an immediate response and inspection booking.
Can AI help with insurance claims?
The AI provides general guidance on the claims process and what to document. Specific claim questions route to your team.
What about emergency leak situations?
Active leaks are identified immediately and can trigger emergency tarp service dispatch.
